segments.text: I am not sure what to do during the holidays , any suggestions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , going to a cinema , visiting the galleries , exhibitions and museums , finding and meeting old friends , exercising in the health club or mountain biking . There are so many good choices .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The problem is that I find all of them are full of fun . I just don ’ t know what to do first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why not start with the most interesting one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I ’ m interested in all of them . The more choices we have , the harder to make a decision .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Toss a coin to decide then .
segments.speaker: S2
